extendedInfo.description: The extinct dragons from the fierce prehistoric battles of the lost land have found their way to this colorful world. The dinosaur hunter is too busy timing them with colors and flashlight effects to expel the dark force of evil dinosaur war. Letâs join the colorful epic hunting adventure of the dangerous creatures from the stone age to make a dino paradise for them. Your preschool aged kid will love coloring this dino island.***How To Play***â Scroll down the images to select one of your choiceâ You can view it now on your coloring screen/coloring spaceâ Select a suitable colorâ Now color the image carefullyâ Save the image to your SD Card/Phone Memory or Image Gallery when you are done***Itâs fully featured with***â Choose from 3 sizes of basic coloring tool brush for your kid painting art skillsâ¬ of color touch effectsâ Use the free tool eraser to rub off the unwanted color flashlightâ¬ from the pictureâ Let your child grow his creative instincts through this fun game with 20 multi color brushes from a range of colors and unique designs.â While your child play around with this interactive touching coloring book, a distraction-free music plays behind to boost up his  creative thoughtsâ You have messed up and donât feel like erasing it all? Press CLEAR ALL and the app do the cleaning job itself.â¬â We have replaced the old method of tap and paint; with the new and improved finger painting technique. Swipe across the screen where you want to color while the-machine-fills it for you. â Save the flashing sketch your fun brain kid has colored, to the SD card/Gallery The color selection and the art of coloring with unique color effects play a distinct role in the development of cognitive, tactile and fine motor skills of your pre-school kids. We have replaced the old method of tap and paint; with the new and improved finger drawing technique.I play this too! And I am sure your toddler would have fun to color the fierce dragons. So get it on your device now to enjoy this kid coloring delightful game. Tell us about your experiences and suggestions to help us keep working on more teaching apps for kids. â¨***DISCLAIMER***â This free app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen.

reviews.title: Would be a 5 STAR game BUT...
reviews.comment: My son loves this but i am uninstalling because PUSH ADS COME LITERALLY EVERY 5 MINUTES in my notification bar. Not to mention the ads in-game COVER THE IMAGE MY SON IS COURING. NO my son DOES NOT want to play KIDS POKER. EVERY GAME BY THESE PEOPLE DO THE SAME THING I am uninstalling EVERY SINGLE ONE.
reviews.author: Nicole Payne

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work and is nothing but ads
reviews.comment: Can not change colors, pictures are cut off, and has ads galore!!! Adding things to ypur home screem ans phone(don\'t know if harmfull or not) Uninstalling now, before I get more things added to my phone that I don\'t want, and could hurt my system.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: OK colouring app but can\'t find saved pictures
reviews.comment: The app is okay, can change colours and templates and haven\'t noticed any unwanted items appear on my phone. It\'s not very useful though when I can\'t find the pictures I\'ve saved. If this gets fixed ill update my review
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Won\'t change pictures and can\'t change the color from blue. Uninstalled until this is fixed!!! HTC Wildfire S
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Its an ok game for when your bored.
reviews.author: Rachel Vadivia
